@nikomatsakis in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/75454, you wrote

As far as ABI, we're not aware of any ABIs for which this property doesn't hold, and if a new ABI were added in the future, we could exempt it if necessary.

So should we extend the statement added to the docs to cover all ABIs? Currently, the FCP just covers specifically the Rust and C ABIs.
